mapper.select: SELECT * FROM record WHERE record.MEMBER_ID = ( SELECT MEMBER_ID from member WHERE USERNAME = #{username})

SELECT r.* FROM record r INNER JOIN music m ON r.music_id = m.music_id WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = ( SELECT MEMBER_ID from member WHERE USERNAME = #{username}) AND m.title = #{title} AND (r.access OR #{condition}) ORDER BY r.created_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (music_id, member_id, instrument, searchable, access, uuid, file_name) VALUES (#{musicId}, #{memberId}, #{instrument}, #{searchable}, #{access}, #{uuid}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE record set access = #{access}, searchable = #{searchable} WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
